name: deletionRanges(for:direction:destination:allowsDecomposition:)
desc: Returns the ranges for deleting the text based on the current selection and movement arguments.
declaration:
func deletionRanges(for textSelection: NSTextSelection, 
          direction: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction, 
        destination: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Destination, 
allowsDecomposition: Bool) -> [NSTextRange]
